title: Walking Back To My Roots
text: Walking Back To My Roots is a travel expedition undertaken by two undergraduate students of IIT Kharagpur. Siddharth Agarwal along with Ashay Gangwar walked 600 km across Rajasthan during December 2014, as a part of their efforts to highlight social issues and initiate cultural revival throughout the country. The duo managed to raise around ₹ 30,000 for Rang De campaign. [ 1 ] {{#evt: service=youtube |id= https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jaS0vTcZ8lA |alignment=right |dimensions=320 |container=frame |description=A video describing their journey, produced by Camera And Shorts. [ 2 ] }} Siddharth Agarwal had previously done a similar campaign called The Madness Project , while Ashay Gangwar is a photographer and film-maker who owns a production house called Camera And Shorts. [ 2 ] [ 3 ]
